Class Log4jYamlObjectMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.core.TreeCodec

            • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.jackson.Log4jYamlObjectMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.core.Versioned, Serializable

    public class Log4jYamlObjectMapper
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLMapper
    A Jackson ObjectMapper initialized for Log4j.

    Consider this class private.
